jobDescription: The Role EverString is looking for strategic, action-oriented, and results-driven Customer Success Director. The Customer Success Director is ultimately responsible for ensuring the post-sales optimization of EverString customers experience & results. As a Customer Success Director, you will be responsible for driving customer adoption and success for high-value enterprise customers. Your focus will be to make every customer in your portfolio a qualified promoter, resulting in long-term loyalty to EverString.  This is a terrific opportunity to help shape the programs that drive success for customers in a rapidly growing, aggressive series B company. Along with early-stage stock options, we offer a competitive compensation and a comprehensive benefits package. Also included are daily perks (like a fully stocked kitchen) above & beyond your typical SaaS company.
